programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Prom is fast approaching, but Clare is MIA from committee meetings.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Zig is hesitant to let Maya see his new place.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After months of flirting via e-mail, thirteen year-old Emma's new love interest, Jordan, is going to be in town. Coincidentally (fatefully?), it's the same night as her mother's high school reunion.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After months of flirting via e-mail, thirteen year-old Emma's new love interest, Jordan, is going to be in town. Coincidentally (fatefully?), it's the same night as her mother's high school reunion.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley has set her sights on becoming Degrassi's School President. Toby, spurred on by their awkward new situation as step-siblings, is frustrated by her unchallenged status and convinces JT to run against her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Terri's sure that no guy will ever want her and she wants to skip the school dance. Spinner seems interested in her though, and Ashley and Paige convince her to let them make her over.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Toby can't stand the idea of Parents Night - the last time his divorced parents were in the same room they had a huge, embarrassing fight.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley and Jimmy's eight-month anniversary is coming up - and so is the question of whether or not to have sex. Paige is playing Juliet opposite Jimmy's English-class Romeo and she's planting doubts in Ashley's mind.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jimmy desperately wants to make the basketball team. But, surprisingly, it looks like Sean is surpassing him as a possible star player.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After a long absence overseas, Ashley's dad is back in town. She's enjoying his company and attention, but something tells her there's a piece of his life that's being kept from her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Lacking real family time at home, Jimmy has been spending more and more time at Ashley's house. He and Toby are like brothers and Kate's begun referring to him as her "third kid".

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Recently diagnosed with a learning disorder, an embarrassed Liberty is ashamed to tell her friends about her tutoring sessions. Emma sees one of Liberty's private sessions and, putting two-and-two together with Liberty's suspicious behaviour, asks J.T. if he thinks something could be going on with Liberty and Mr. Armstrong the math teacher.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Sean asks Emma what she's doing tonight, Emma's thrilled - that's a date, right? But nervous Sean is unable to muster the courage to arrange the details and Emma misunderstands his hesitancy as rejection.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Paige decides to start a Spirit Squad at Degrassi, Emma can't believe that the "sexist" sport of cheerleading is being revived. But Manny, who's had years of gymnastics training and is desperate for something to help make her "cool", wants to try out.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley's convinced that she and Terri are going to be the stars of the school talent show, singing her new (and incredibly earnest) ballad. Terri would rather add Paige -- and some fun sparkle -- to the act, but she's not sure how to tell Ashley that.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Faced with the pressure of passing Grade 7 on his second time around and his mother's newest threat to take him back to his unhappy life up north, Sean is beginning to slip into old, angry patterns.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Perfect Ashley is beginning to bore even herself. With their parents away for the weekend, Ashley decides to join Toby in breaking the "one-guest-each" rule and invites Paige and Hazel to join her and Terri.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Summer's over and the Degrassi kids are back…in droves. A neighbouring high school has been amalgamated with the Junior High and things are a bit of a zoo.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Summer's over and the Degrassi kids are back…in droves. A neighbouring high school has been amalgamated with the Junior High and things are a bit of a zoo.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Spike reveals the identity of the mystery man she's been dating, Emma is shocked. Mr. Simpson - her teacher! Emma claims she’s okay with it, but if that’s true, why is suddenly being so rude to Mr. Simpson?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley feels like an outcast. Nobody's willing to forget how she treated them at her party last year. Ash decides to take action, swallows her pride and apologizes to everyone. And it works. She boasts to Terri about her success- it’s like last year never happened!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It's Science Fair time at Degrassi. Emma’s a serious contender for first prize, but when the results of her experiment don't fall in line with her hypothesis, she's in a panic.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Joey is going away for the weekend with his latest girlfriend, and Craig is surprised when Joey tells him he can stay on his own – and even have the guys over! When the guys get to Craig’s for the weekend, they can’t think of much to do – they’re bored. After a lame afternoon they’re raring to let loose - and what better way than by taking a drive?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Degrassi Panthers have a new star soccer player, Spinner. His victory’s even sweeter when Paige agrees to a movie. When the losing team's defensive back, the gorgeous Dean, invites a smitten Paige to a house party, she cancels on Spinner.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Haunted by memories of her recent sexual assault, Paige is desperately trying to appear normal. A girl band contest sounds like a great distraction. Terri wants to reunite PMS—including Ashley. Paige refuses, and recruits Hazel instead.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Toby is tired of being an invisible computer geek so he decides to join a sports team. Girls love wrestlers - that includes Toby’s crush Kendra. To Toby's dismay, the few extra pounds he carries put him in the same weight class as athletic Sean.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny’s crush on Craig has reached huge proportions and everyone’s urging her to ask him out already! But Manny’s a romantic; she thinks the guy ought to do the asking

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Grade Nine International Day is coming up and Hazel isn’t thrilled. After all, Hazel’s Jamaican and everybody loves the islands - right? When the day arrives, Hazel’s display is a hit, but she isn’t acting like herself.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma Nelson is reveling in her newest job as her mom's maid of honour and planner extraordinaire! Her mom, Spike, is marrying her high-school crush, Snake - who also just happens to be Emma's favourite teacher.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma Nelson is reveling in her newest job as her mom's maid of honour and planner extraordinaire! Her mom, Spike, is marrying her high-school crush, Snake - who also just happens to be Emma's favourite teacher.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marco and Ellie are the best of friends. But Ellie is starting to want more…Marco though can’t seem to respond in kind. He’s more and more confused about what and who he’s looking for…..

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When class clown JT acts up in Science class, his teacher Ms. Hatzilakos gives him a serious detention - assisting her with the guinea pigs all week. JT’s annoyed, but he perks up when his friends point out that he’s getting alone time with the best looking teacher in school.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Things are looking up for Sean. He and Emma are back together. He’s a star on the basketball team.And he and Jimmy have buried the hatchet. Jimmy’s even invited him to a party. But the good feelings don’t last for long.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Liberty can’t believe it when she doesn’t make the Girls Floor Hockey team – she’s never failed at anything. So when Coach Hatzilakos asks her to be the Team Manager, Liberty throws all her energy into managing.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley and Jimmy are back together, but it doesn’t feel quite the same. Ash may not look the same as last year – she’s a Goth now – but Jimmy’s sure she’s still the same golden girl inside.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma’s mom is away for a few days and it’s just her and her step-dad, Mr. Simpson. He’s supportive of Emma’s involvement in “Food for Thought”; the student group who wants to remove genetically modified (GM) foods from the school cafeteria.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After being in counselling for a long time, Paige is positive she’s recovered from her date rape. In fact, she’s convinced her life is back to normal – Dean and what he did are behind her forever. She never wants to see him again, so she’s dismissive.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s exam time and everyone’s stressed – especially Craig. In a surprise visit from his father, Craig learns that his dad is very eager to have him back in his life.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Although his father is gone, Craig wants to get on with his life as normal. He insists on going back to school immediately and becomes frustrated with his friends when they behave with concern.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The pending birth a new baby for Spike and Snake inspires Emma to search for her birth father. With some detective work, Emma discovers that her father, Shane, lives just outside the city.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The pending birth a new baby for Spike and Snake inspires Emma to search for her birth father. With some detective work, Emma discovers that her father, Shane, lives just outside the city.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny’s on a mission this year—it’s bye bye cute and hello hot. That means midriff baring tops, low-riders and thongs.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Paige organizes a final hurrah at the beach and even convinces her older brother, Dylan, to act as chauffeur. Spinner’s a bit put-off by Dylan’s openly gay attitude, but his presence is an eye-opener for Marco.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Spinner just can’t deal with the fact that Marco’s gay so he tries to cut Marco out of life. But when the guys all go to see Dylan’s hockey game, Jimmy makes sure that Marco comes along.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Things haven’t been going very well for Sean lately. Emma’s busy dealing with Snake’s illness and a brand new baby brother and Tracker’s busy leading the exciting life a normal 20-something.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: Should I Stay or Should I Go?
programme.desc: Things are pretty hot between Craig and Ashley, but he’s disappointed that she keeps pulling back from going all the way.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Life’s getting more and more stressful for Ellie—her dad just left on another Peacekeeping Mission, her mom’s drinking again and she’s interning for Caitlin Ryan’s tv show. As things get more and more hectic, Ellie has no one to help her cope.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma decides it’s time to move on in matters of the heart when she realizes she has feelings for new kid Chris.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Terri’s in heaven-- not only does she have a terrific boyfriend, the wonderful romantic Rick, she also has the lead in the school play!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The holiday season is fast approaching and the Jeremiah house is abuzz - Angela has her upcoming Christmas skating pageant, Craig and Ashley are a serious item, and Joey and Sydney are getting serious. As Sydney organizes the perfect Christmas, Caitlin feels like the odd girl out.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The holiday season is fast approaching and the Jeremiah house is abuzz - Angela has her upcoming Christmas skating pageant, Craig and Ashley are a serious item, and Joey and Sydney are getting serious.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Things are back on track for Emma now that she’s officially over Sean. Chris has even asked her out! But when she hears rumours that Sean’s part of a gang stealing things from Degrassi (including Mr. Simpson’s laptop), Emma becomes obsessed with bringing Sean to justice.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s a big gymnastics meet at Degrassi, and Manny’s going to lead the team to gold! But when she starts to feel sick, she fears that her queasy stomach might be more than the flu or even a bad nerves.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny’s tempted by the romantic family scenario Craig paints and begins to think she and Craig really could keep this baby. Even Ashley shares the news with the entire cafeteria.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Five kids from different worlds are stuck in a room -- on a Saturday! When Raditch introduces Saturday detention, Sean, Ellie, Hazel, Jimmy and Toby are the first inductees.
